May 12, 2001 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Test Piece Contest
Journey into Freedom
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: G. Hann of Treherbert Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed
Sept. 28, 2011, 12:38 p.m. June 30, 2020, 9:03 p.m.
